QuestData.Title: Fortunate Misunderstandings
QuestData.Description: I sorry! I not mean to get you in trouble!$B$B<The injured oracle stares at you blankly for a long while.>$B$BYou save me! We thank you. We going to go back to village now. You come too... you can stay with us! Puppy-men kind of mean anyway.$B$BLet me know when you ready to go, okay?
QuestData.AreaDescription: Escort the Injured Rainspeaker Oracle to Rainspaker Canopy
QuestData.LogDescription: Escort the Injured Rainspeaker Oracle to Rainspeaker Canopy and speak to High-Oracle Soo-say.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to High-Oracle Soo-say at Rainspeaker Canopy in Sholazar Basin.
QuestData.CompletionText: Who you? You stink of puppy-men.
QuestData.RewardText: You help us? You welcome then, dryskin.
